name: Kagichan
description:
Take control of the titular Kagami as she does battle with five different bosses. The game comes with five difficulty settings, from modest changes made by easy and hard modes to the truly difficult twist of intense and rage modes.

If you find any bugs or have any questions feel free to reach me by tweeting me @Emanation_Games

What’s Kagichan worth to you? While Kagichan is free and always will be. Please consider paying whatever you think it’s worth. Whether it’s one dollar or ten dollars, every bit helps me to create more and better games.
